title: KDP Keywords for Kindle Publishing - Get Profitable Amazon Keywords

tactics.name: incognito_keyword_research
tactics.description: Use Amazon's auto-suggestions in incognito mode to find relevant keywords without personalized history interference
caveats: May fail for overly broad keywords
source_quotes: you need incognito mode to research keyword options that aren't tailored to your previous browsing experiences

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If keywords have low review counts, prioritize them for better discoverability
source_quotes: using keywords with low relevancy to your niche is a waste of time

claims.statement: Keyword research improves with practice and pattern recognition over time
source_quotes: eventually you'll detect a pattern of words and common phrases associated with your niche

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with constrained needs
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Improves keyword relevance and reduces competition
source_quotes: building a brand is vital to your long-term sustainability and business success
